content.raw:
I just launched vrc worlds ~10 times during full system load using drcsim_2.5 and it didn't fall down ... so yea might be an old problem. :) I guess I merged default into my fork shortly before 2.5 got merged into default 3 days ago.

Can you confirm that it's working with the current default/2.5 @brawner ?
